Chapter 3 Methods We describe our methods in this chapter. Math can be added in body using usual syntax like this 3.1 math example \(p\) is unknown but expected to be around 1/3. Standard error will be approximated \[ SE = \sqrt(\frac{p(1-p)}{n}) \approx \sqrt{\frac{1/3 (1 - 1/3)} {300}} = 0.027 \] You can also use math in footnotes like this1. We will approximate standard error to 0.0272 where we mention \(p = \frac{a}{b}\)↩︎ \(p\) is unknown but expected to be around 1/3.
